Title: Relates to expungement of records for certain juveniles convicted of a nonviolent offense after seven years
Summary: Relates to expungement of records for certain juveniles convicted of a nonviolent offense after seven years and satisfactory completion of his or her probation, parole, supervised release and payment of any fines imposed or restitution ordered, whichever is later.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to expungement of records for certain juveniles convicted of a nonviolent offense after seven years
